Slash.display_help: The Snake has lowered your defense with his sword.
Slash.display_target_help: The Snake has lowered your defense with his sword.

Mesmerize.display_help: The Snake painfully enraptures your mind with psychic energy rendering you unconscious.
Mesmerize.display_target_help: The Snake painfully enraptures your mind with psychic energy rendering you unconscious.

Slice.display_help: The Snake has lowered your defense with his sword.
Slice.display_target_help: The Snake has lowered your defense with his sword.

Venomous_Spray.display_help: The Snake sprays toxic venom all over you.

Swoop.display_help: You swing your mace in a wide arc in front of you. This attack strikes all foes within melee range, deals them serious damage and minor Toxic damage over time, and knocks them down.
Swoop.display_short_help: Melee (Cone), Moderate DMG(Smash), Minor DoT(Toxic), Knockback

Poison_Beam.display_help: The Nullifier Mace is capable of firing a tremendous bolt of force from the end of it. Arachnos Troopers call this the Power Blast, the Arbiters who invented it scoff at this simple term.
Poison_Beam.display_short_help: Cone Ranged, Moderate DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe Knockback

Heal_Other.display_help: Heals a single targeted ally. You cannot use this power to heal yourself. Recharge: Fast

Venomous_Spray.display_help: The Snake sprays toxic venom all over you.

Venomous_Spit.display_help: The Snake spits a burning poison that deals Toxic damage over time.
Venomous_Spit.display_target_help: The Snake spits a burning poison that deals Toxic damage over time.

Positioning.display_help: Elder Mambas prefer to attack from range, and will flee if attacked in melee.
Positioning.display_target_help: Elder Mambas prefer to attack from range, and will flee if attacked in melee.

Venomous_Spit.display_help: The Snake spits a burning poison that deals Toxic damage over time.
Venomous_Spit.display_target_help: The Snake spits a burning poison that deals Toxic damage over time.

Hide.display_help: Hide makes you almost impossible to detect. When properly 'Hidden", a Stalker can pull off Critical hits with his attacks, and even land a massive 'Assassins Strike' with an Assassins power. When you attack or are damaged while using this power, you will be discovered. Even if discovered, you are hard to see and retain some bonus to Defense. Unlike most stealth powers, Hide can be used at the same time as other Concealment powers, giving you even greater stealth capability. Very low Endurance cost.

Throwing_Daggers.display_help: Three thrown dagger that can hit multiple targets.
Throwing_Daggers.display_target_help: Three thrown dagger that can hit multiple targets.

Swipe.display_help: A fast claw attack that shreds your opponent.
Swipe.display_target_help: A fast claw attack that shreds your opponent.

Resilience.display_help: Snakes are highly resistant to Toxic Damage but vulnerable to Cold.
Resilience.display_target_help: Snakes are highly resistant to Toxic Damage but vulnerable to Cold.

Resistance.display_help: Snakes are highly resistant to Toxic Damage but vulnerable to Cold.
Resistance.display_target_help: Snakes are highly resistant to Toxic Damage but vulnerable to Cold.

Regenerate.display_help: A Snake can activate this power to increase his maximum Hit Points for a short time.
Regenerate.display_target_help: A Snake can activate this power to increase his maximum Hit Points for a short time.

Hack.display_help: The Snake has lowered your defense with his sword.
Hack.display_target_help: The Snake has lowered your defense with his sword.

Quick.display_help: You can naturally run slightly faster than normal. This ability is always on and does not cost any Endurance.
Quick.display_target_help: You can naturally run slightly faster than normal. This ability is always on and does not cost any Endurance.

Venomous_Spit.display_target_help: The Snake spits a burning poison that deals Toxic damage over time.

Mesmerize.display_target_help: The Snake painfully enraptures your mind with psychic energy rendering you unconscious.

Mass_Hypnosis.display_help: The Snake has hypnotized you. You are helpless for a while, unless something snaps you out of it.
Mass_Hypnosis.display_target_help: The Snake has hypnotized you. You are helpless for a while, unless something snaps you out of it.

Dominate.display_help: Psychic energy tears at your mind rendering you helpless, lost in your own mind and unable to defend yourself.
Dominate.display_target_help: Psychic energy tears at your mind rendering you helpless, lost in your own mind and unable to defend yourself.

Venomous_Spit.display_help: The Snake spits a burning poison that deals Toxic damage over time.
Venomous_Spit.display_target_help: The Snake spits a burning poison that deals Toxic damage over time.

Dreadful_Wail.display_help: Your Dreadful Wail is so strong that most foes will be defeated by being subjected to it. Dreadful Wail deals massive damage to all nearby foes, although the damage does vary. Activating this power leaves you drained of Endurance, and unable to recover Endurance for a while. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Long
Dreadful_Wail.display_target_help: You have been Disoriented and your resistance to damage has been decreased.
